Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Spineless \Spine"less\, a. 1. Having no spine, or vertebral column. [1913 Webster]
2. Having no thorns or barbs. [PJC]
3. lacking in strength of character; cowardly, in a physical or moral sense. [PJC]
spineless adj 1: weak in willpower [syn: {namby-pamby}, {wishy-washy}] 2: lacking courage or vitality; "he was a yellow gutless worm"; "a spineless craven fellow" [syn: {gutless}] [ant: {gutsy}]
